ygData.subject: Re: RTS
ygData.msgSnippet: The RTS is not found in Lavastorms. Its found either in PAW or in Lake Rathe at the Gnoll ruins...right by the South Karana zone. By day, the gnolls spawn, at
ygData.messageBody:
The RTS is not found in Lavastorms. Its found either in PAW or in Lake Rathe
at the Gnoll ruins...right by the South Karana zone. By day, the gnolls
spawn, at night, drybone skeletons spawn, which sometime drops small bronze
armor.

Hope this clarifies.

Lana


----Original Message Follows----
From: "K" <kayntwhyle@...>
Reply-To: EQCheats@onelist.com
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] RTS
Date: Mon, 16 Aug 1999 08:31:52 -0700

From: "K" <kayntwhyle@...>

whoa right there... did you say rts is available in LAVASTORM? Confirm this,
please... I've never seen a Gnoll in LS, are you sure you don't mean Lake
Rathe?
